title: Leaving the Desert_ Embracing the Simplicity of A Course in Mira
description: After completing a first reading of "A Course in Miracles", the most challenging read of her life, the author exclaimed, Ã¢â‚¬Å“Never again!Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½ Yet, she knew that if she were to make real progress with her lifelong spiritual quest, she would need a thorough understanding of the CourseÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s unique thought system. So, back to school she wentÃ¢â‚¬â€the school of life, that is. Though a seasoned seeker, never did she anticipate the dark nights she would encounter along the journey, nor the gift of grace that would pull her through.
